name: Abyssal Hunter
text: {B}, {T}: Tap target creature. Abyssal Hunter deals damage equal to Abyssal Hunter's power to that creature.
flavor: Some smiles show cheer; some merely show teeth.

name: Acidic Dagger
text: {4}, {T}: Whenever target creature deals combat damage to a non-Wall creature this turn, destroy that non-Wall creature. When the targeted creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Acidic Dagger. Activate this ability only before blockers are declared.

name: Afiya Grove
text: Afiya Grove enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, move a +1/+1 counter from Afiya Grove onto target creature.\nWhen Afiya Grove has no +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice it.

name: Afterlife
text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller puts a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
flavor: Facets of life, reflections of the soul.

name: Agility
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flanking. (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)

name: Alarum
text: Untap target nonattacking creature. It gets +1/+3 until end of turn.
flavor: "One timely cry of warning can save nine of surprise."\n—Sidar Jabari

name: Aleatory
text: Cast Aleatory only during combat after blockers are declared.\nFlip a coin. If you win the flip, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.\nDraw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Amber Prison
text: You may choose not to untap Amber Prison during your untap step.\n{4}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land. That permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Amber Prison remains tapped.

name: Amulet of Unmaking
text: {5}, {T}, Exile Amulet of Unmaking: Exile target artifact, creature, or land. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor: Trade to trade, not to keep.\n—Suq'Ata motto

name: Ancestral Memories
text: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
flavor: "Even the ancient storytellers proclaimed Zhalfir to be dominant over all Jamuraa. Kaervek's invasion shocked us all."\n—Hakim, Loreweaver

name: Armor of Thorns
text: You may cast Armor of Thorns as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step.\nEnchant nonblack creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+2.

name: Armorer Guildmage
text: {B}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.\n{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: Zhalfir's destiny rings in tempered steel.\n—Armorer Guild maxim

name: Ashen Powder
text: Put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
flavor: "What you call decay, I call ripening. You'll gain no sustenance from this harvest."\n—Kaervek

name: Asmira, Holy Avenger
text: Flying\nAt the beginning of each end step, put a +1/+1 counter on Asmira, Holy Avenger for each creature put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn.
flavor: "Omens lie in this early harvest's fruit."\n—Asmira, Holy Avenger

name: Auspicious Ancestor
text: When Auspicious Ancestor dies, you gain 3 life.\nWhenever a player casts a white spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

name: Azimaet Drake
text: Flying\n{U}: Azimaet Drake gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavor: "A vizier's dish, best served drenched in honey and almonds."\n—Suq'Ata royal recipe

name: Bad River
text: Bad River enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}, Sacrifice Bad River: Search your library for an Island or Swamp card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Barbed Foliage
text: Whenever a creature attacks you, it loses flanking until end of turn.\nWhenever a creature without flying attacks you, Barbed Foliage deals 1 damage to it.

name: Barbed-Back Wurm
text: {B}: Target green creature blocking Barbed-Back Wurm gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: "The Mwonvuli Jungle has given the darkness teeth for tearing the gift of life from the weak."\n—Jolrael

name: Barreling Attack
text: Target creature gains trample until end of turn. When that creature becomes blocked this turn, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.
flavor: "The trollish game of push-fall inspired this impressive tactic."\n—Sidar Jabari

name: Basalt Golem
text: Basalt Golem can't be blocked by artifact creatures.\nWhenever Basalt Golem becomes blocked by a creature, that creature's controller sacrifices it at end of combat. If the player does, he or she puts a 0/2 colorless Wall artifact creature token with defender onto the battlefield.

name: Bay Falcon
text: Flying, vigilance
flavor: "Wear the falcon's feathers in your hair—\nbe fast as the falcon, bright as the Sun."\n—"Rise on Wings," Zhalfirin song

name: Bazaar of Wonders
text: When Bazaar of Wonders enters the battlefield, exile all cards from all graveyards.\nWhenever a player casts a spell, counter it if a card with the same name is in a graveyard or a nontoken permanent with the same name is on the battlefield.

name: Benevolent Unicorn
text: If a spell would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals that much damage minus 1 to that creature or player instead.
flavor: The best use for a unicorn's horn is to adorn a unicorn.\n—Femeref adage

name: Benthic Djinn
text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life.
flavor: "In all my years I've only met one mage who successfully trapped a djinn—and none who tried and failed."\n—Talibah, embermage

name: Binding Agony
text: Enchant creature\nWhenever enchanted creature is dealt damage, Binding Agony deals that much damage to that creature's controller.
flavor: A crash of rhinos in my head\n—Femeref expression meaning\n"a severe head pain"

name: Blighted Shaman
text: {T}, Sacrifice a Swamp: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.\n{T}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Blind Fury
text: All creatures lose trample until end of turn. If a creature would deal combat damage to a creature this turn, it deals double that damage to that creature instead.
flavor: "Tell me . . . have you ever sung the Song of Blood?"\n—Purraj of Urborg

name: Blinding Light
text: Tap all nonwhite creatures.
flavor: "My shield will bear a shining sun so you will always be with me. / Inlaid with gold, it will shine like glowing embers."\n—"Love Song of Night and Day"

name: Blistering Barrier
text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
flavor: I live without food, stand without leg, wound without force, and am harder to fight than to kill. What am I?\n—Femeref riddle

name: Bone Harvest
text: Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.\nDraw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor: "Only fools believe they will face my armies but once."\n—Kaervek

name: Bone Mask
text: {2}, {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. Exile cards from the top of your library equal to the damage prevented this way.
flavor: "The protection offered comes at a price. How numerous are your kin?"\n—Purraj of Urborg

name: Boomerang
text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor: A lie always returns; be careful how you catch it.

name: Breathstealer
text: {B}: Breathstealer gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: "As a child, I slept with a cloth over my face, to hide from the spirits that might pull the air from my lungs."\n—Mosi, Femeref weaver

name: Brushwagg
text: Whenever Brushwagg blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: "Defiantly, the young cyclops popped the brushwagg into his mouth. His cheeks suddenly puffed, his eye bulged, and he was forced to agree with his elder."\n—Afari, Tales

name: Builder's Bane
text: Destroy X target artifacts. Builder's Bane deals damage to each player equal to the number of artifacts he or she controlled put into a graveyard this way.
flavor: There is only so much a person may be buried with.

name: Burning Palm Efreet
text: {1}{R}{R}: Burning Palm Efreet deals 2 damage to target creature with flying and that creature loses flying until end of turn.
flavor: Even the lion envies the lark.

name: Burning Shield Askari
text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)\n{R}{R}: Burning Shield Askari gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor: "Any day that I ride my horse up to my ankles in the remains of my enemies is a good day."\n—Akin, seasoned askari

name: Cadaverous Bloom
text: Exile a card from your hand: Add {B}{B} or {G}{G} to your mana pool.
flavor: "It's filthy work, planting them."\n—Kifimbo, Shadow Guildmage

name: Cadaverous Knight
text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)\n{1}{B}{B}: Regenerate Cadaverous Knight.
flavor: Grieve for the soul in death dishonored.\n—Shadow Guild saying

name: Canopy Dragon
text: Trample\n{1}{G}: Canopy Dragon gains flying and loses trample until end of turn.
flavor: "In the Mwonvuli you must divide your attention between what hangs overhead and what lies underfoot."\n—Sidar Jabari

name: Carrion
text: As an additional cost to cast Carrion, sacrifice a creature.\nPut X 0/1 black Insect creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.
flavor: King or herder, the maggots care not.

name: Catacomb Dragon
text: Flying\nWhenever Catacomb Dragon becomes blocked by a nonartifact, non-Dragon creature, that creature gets -X/-0 until end of turn, where X is half the creature's power, rounded down.

name: Celestial Dawn
text: Lands you control are Plains.\nNonland cards you own that aren't on the battlefield, spells you control, and nonland permanents you control are white.\nYou may spend white mana as though it were mana of any color. You may spend other mana only as though it were colorless mana.

name: Cerulean Wyvern
text: Flying, protection from green
flavor: "Once, a Quirion asked why I was so cautious when the day was clear. I told him of the sky-blue hide of the cerluean wyvern, and he offered me double if I could conjure a strong tailwind!"\n—Sisay, Captain of the Weatherlight

name: Chaos Charm
text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target Wall.
• Chaos Charm deals 1 damage to target creature.
• Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

name: Chaosphere
text: Creatures with flying can block only creatures with flying.\nCreatures without flying have reach. (They can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: "I dance the nothing dance, / Feet in the air, knives in the ground."\n—Femeref chant

name: Charcoal Diamond
text: Charcoal Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.

name: Chariot of the Sun
text: {2}, {T}: Until end of turn, target creature you control gains flying and has base toughness 1.
flavor: "Sun follows Moon until she tires, then carries her until she's strong / and runs ahead of him again."\n—"Love Song of Night and Day"

name: Choking Sands
text: Destroy target non-Swamp land. If that land was nonbasic, Choking Sands deals 2 damage to the land's controller.
flavor: "The people wiped the sand from their eyes and cursed—and left the barren land to the hyenas and vipers."\n—Afari, Tales

name: Cinder Cloud
text: Destroy target creature. If a white creature dies this way, Cinder Cloud deals damage to that creature's controller equal to the creature's power.

name: Circle of Despair
text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature or player this turn, prevent that damage.
flavor: "Life is a resource that should belong only to the strong."\n—Shauku, Endbringer

name: Civic Guildmage
text: {G}, {T}: Target creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.\n{U}, {T}: Put target creature you control on top of its owner's library.
flavor: To condemn the innocent you must first condemn yourself.\n—Civic Guild maxim

name: Cloak of Invisibility
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature has phasing and can't be blocked except by Walls. (It phases in or out before its controller untaps during each of his or her untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)
flavor: "Useful . . . if you can find it."\n—Pashad ibn Asim, Suq'Ata trader

name: Consuming Ferocity
text: Enchant non-Wall creature\nEnchanted creature gets +1/+0.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+0 counter on enchanted creature. If that creature has three or more +1/+0 counters on it, it deals damage equal to its power to its controller, then destroy that creature and it can't be regenerated.

name: Coral Fighters
text: Whenever Coral Fighters attacks and isn't blocked, look at the top card of defending player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.

name: Crash of Rhinos
text: Trample
flavor: Love is like a rhino, short-sighted and hasty; if it cannot find a way, it will make a way.\n—Femeref adage

name: Crimson Hellkite
text: Flying\n{X}, {T}: Crimson Hellkite deals X damage to target creature. Spend only red mana on X.
flavor: "Dragonfire forged me a warrior."\n—Rashida Scalebane

name: Crimson Roc
text: Flying\nWhenever Crimson Roc blocks a creature without flying, Crimson Roc gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

name: Crypt Cobra
text: Whenever Crypt Cobra attacks and isn't blocked, defending player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

name: Crystal Golem
text: At the beginning of your end step, Crystal Golem phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before you untap during your next untap step.)
flavor: "Once, a wealthy king commissioned an artificial creature to be crafted from the royal treasury, thinking it a clever ploy to have the jewels guard themselves."\n—Azeworai, "The Golem's Wish"

name: Crystal Vein
text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{T}, Sacrifice Crystal Vein: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

name: Cursed Totem
text: Activated abilities of creatures can't be activated.
flavor: Pass me from soul to soul / soldier to herder, herder to beast, beast to soil / until I am everywhere. / Then pass me those souls.\n—Totem inscription (translated)

name: Cycle of Life
text: Return Cycle of Life to its owner's hand: Target creature you cast this turn has base power and toughness 0/1 until your next upkeep. At the beginning of your next upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
flavor: Thus does nature assert herself.

name: Daring Apprentice
text: {T}, Sacrifice Daring Apprentice: Counter target spell.
flavor: In front of every great wizard is a doomed apprentice.

name: Dark Banishing
text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: "Femeref was guided by the wisdom of the Council of Voices. But in one terrible instant, they were slain, leaving Asmira as the sole voice of leadership."\n—Hakim, Loreweaver

name: Dark Ritual
text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
flavor: "The ceremony ended with a voice from the shadows, a voice with vast, ominous power."\n—Kifimbo, Shadow Guildmage

name: Dazzling Beauty
text: Cast Dazzling Beauty only during the declare blockers step.\nTarget unblocked attacking creature becomes blocked. (This spell works on creatures that can't be blocked.)\nDraw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Decomposition
text: Enchant black creature\nEnchanted creature has "Cumulative upkeep—Pay 1 life." (At the beginning of its controller's upkeep, that player puts an age counter on it, then sacrifices it unless he or she pays its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)\nWhen enchanted creature dies, its controller loses 2 life.

name: Delirium
text: Cast Delirium only during an opponent's turn.\nTap target creature that player controls. That creature deals damage equal to its power to the player. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by the creature this turn.

name: Dirtwater Wraith
text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)\n{B}: Dirtwater Wraith gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "The foul entities of the Uuserk swamp had never before dared to spread their influence to the very heart of Zhalfir."\n—Hakim, Loreweaver

name: Discordant Spirit
text: At the beginning of each end step, if it's an opponent's turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Discordant Spirit for each 1 damage dealt to you this turn.\nAt the beginning of your end step, remove all +1/+1 counters from Discordant Spirit.

name: Disempower
text: Put target artifact or enchantment on top of its owner's library.
flavor: "Mangara is gone. Who among you doubts that I have taken his power?"\n—Kaervek

name: Disenchant
text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: "There are harsher ways to learn the meaning of the word ‘no.'"\n—Rashida Scalebane

name: Dissipate
text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
flavor: "If you weren't born with it, you don't need it."\n—Grahilah, former trader of Amiqat

name: Divine Offering
text: Destroy target artifact. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.
flavor: "Suq'Ata believe in trade; Femeref, alms; Zhalfirins, steel. Be warned, Kaervek—now we are joined."\n—Sidar Jabari

name: Divine Retribution
text: Divine Retribution deals damage to target attacking creature equal to the number of attacking creatures.
flavor: "To the undiscerning eye, justice and vengeance can look the same."\n—Rashida Scalebane

name: Drain Life
text: Spend only black mana on X.\nDrain Life deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more life than the player's life total before Drain Life dealt damage or the creature's toughness.

name: Dread Specter
text: Whenever Dread Specter blocks or becomes blocked by a nonblack creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
flavor: Whatever follows life is incurable.\n—Zhalfirin aphorism

name: Dream Cache
text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand both on top of your library or both on the bottom of your library.
flavor: Dreams' riches are easily spent.\n—Suq'Ata adage

name: Dream Fighter
text: Whenever Dream Fighter blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Dream Fighter and that creature phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. Each one phases in before its controller untaps during his or her next untap step.)
flavor: Not only the sleeping should fear dreams.

name: Dwarven Miner
text: {2}{R}, {T}: Destroy target nonbasic land.
flavor: "Fetch the pestridder, Paka—we've got dwarves in the rutabagas!"\n—Jamul, Femeref farmer

name: Dwarven Nomad
text: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
flavor: A dwarf's life belongs as much to the land as to the dwarf.\n—Creed of the Stonethrow Clan

name: Early Harvest
text: Target player untaps all basic lands he or she controls.
flavor: "Tonight we'll eat a farewell feast. Cold corn porridge is not enough. / Let's peel papayas, pineapples, and mangoes, drink coconut milk, / and bake bananas."\n—"Love Song of Night and Day"

name: Ebony Charm
text:
Choose one —
• Target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
• Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard.
• Target creature gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

name: Ekundu Cyclops
text: If a creature you control attacks, Ekundu Cyclops also attacks if able.
flavor:
"Big one I,
One big eye.
One-eye see
Two-eye die!"
—Traditional cyclops chant

name: Ekundu Griffin
text: Flying, first strike
flavor: "My goat was a small price to pay for the chance to see the hunting griffin dive and seize it."\n—Pashad ibn Asim, Suq'Ata trader

name: Elixir of Vitality
text: Elixir of Vitality enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}, Sacrifice Elixir of Vitality: You gain 4 life.\n{8}, {T}, Sacrifice Elixir of Vitality: You gain 8 life.
flavor: "Eternal life or your money back."\n—Unnamed Suq'Ata merchant, deceased

name: Emberwilde Caliph
text: Flying, trample\nEmberwilde Caliph attacks each turn if able.\nWhenever Emberwilde Caliph deals damage, you lose that much life.
flavor: The fire breathes while the air burns.

name: Emberwilde Djinn
text: Flying\nAt the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may pay {R}{R} or 2 life. If he or she does, the player gains control of Emberwilde Djinn.
flavor: A hefty price is no guarantee of quality merchandise.

name: Energy Bolt
text: Choose one —\n• Energy Bolt deals X damage to target player.\n• Target player gains X life.
flavor: Life and death are two faces of the same coin.

name: Energy Vortex
text:
As Energy Vortex enters the battlefield, choose an opponent.
At the beginning of your upkeep, remove all energy counters from Energy Vortex.
At the beginning of the chosen player's upkeep, Energy Vortex deals 3 damage to that player unless he or she pays {1} for each energy counter on Energy Vortex.
{X}: Put X energy counters on Energy Vortex. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

name: Enfeeblement
text: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)\nEnchanted creature gets -2/-2.
flavor: "If it is weak, either kill it or ignore it. Anything else honors it."\n—Kaervek

name: Enlightened Tutor
text: Search your library for an artifact or enchantment card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.
flavor: "I do not teach. I simply reveal."\n—Daudi, Femeref tutor

name: Ersatz Gnomes
text: {T}: Target spell becomes colorless.\n{T}: Target permanent becomes colorless until end of turn.
flavor: From jungle to sea, from sea to stone, from stone to field, from field to bone. What am I? —Zhalfirin riddle

name: Ether Well
text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library. If that creature is red, you may put it on the bottom of its owner's library instead.
flavor: "Whoa—my tail will never fit through that hole!"

name: Ethereal Champion
text: Pay 1 life: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Ethereal Champion this turn.
flavor: "If I have learned anything as a wizard it is this: never fight your own battles."\n—Waffa, sorcerer of Nyomba

name: Fallow Earth
text: Put target land on top of its owner's library.
flavor: ". . . and when the farmer awoke the next morning, all the seeds from his field were once again in their sacks."\n—Afari, Tales

name: Favorable Destiny
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +1/+2 as long as it's white.\nEnchanted creature has shroud as long as its controller controls another creature. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

name: Femeref Archers
text: {T}: Femeref Archers deals 4 damage to target attacking creature with flying.
flavor: "They say a Zhalfirin archer can split the eye of a griffin. Nonsense, of course: they have no faith to guide their darts."\n—Nuru, Femeref archer

name: Femeref Healer
text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
flavor: "Faith is my shield, and hope is my armor; I am vulnerable only to myself."\n—Asmira, Holy Avenger

name: Femeref Knight
text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)\n{W}: Femeref Knight gains vigilance until end of turn.
flavor: "I will return / with lizard skins for your sandals. Paint your eyes black and wait for me." —"Love Song of Night and Day"

name: Femeref Scouts
flavor: "The days before the war were filled with strange portents: scouts and herders spoke of villages reduced to ash, of farmers taken from their fields, and of foul beasts roaming the plains in packs. I know, for I spoke to them all."\n—Hakim, Loreweaver

name: Feral Shadow
text: Flying
flavor: "The night stalkers are such a minor power in Urborg. Their sad eagerness to elevate themselves makes them willing tools in the plundering of little Femeref."\n—Kaervek

name: Fetid Horror
text: {B}: Fetid Horror gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "Of the six who went down the Uuserek Trail to scout ahead, one returned. She clawed at her eyes and nostrils and sobbed with horror. I was curious about what she saw, but we chose another path."\n—Scout Ekemet, final journal

name: Final Fortune
text: Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, you lose the game.
flavor: Want all, lose all.\n—Zhalfirin aphorism

name: Fire Diamond
text: Fire Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

name: Firebreathing
text: Enchant creature\n{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "Magic's only part of it, my friend. Diet does the rest."\n—Pashad ibn Asim, Suq'Ata trader

name: Flame Elemental
text: {R}, {T}, Sacrifice Flame Elemental: Flame Elemental deals damage equal to its power to target creature.
flavor: Storyteller: By my hand in the fire, this story is a tale of power.\nListeners: May it give you strength.

name: Flare
text: Flare deals 1 damage to target creature or player.\nDraw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor: "In the forest, fires light the sky as black clouds unfold their weight."\n—"Love Song of Night and Day"

name: Flash
text: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you do, sacrifice it unless you pay its mana cost reduced by up to {2}.

name: Flood Plain
text: Flood Plain enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}, Sacrifice Flood Plain: Search your library for a Plains or Island card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Floodgate
text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)\nWhen Floodgate has flying, sacrifice it.\nWhen Floodgate leaves the battlefield, it deals damage equal to half the number of Islands you control, rounded down, to each nonblue creature without flying.
flavor: "Quick, Rhirhok—teach me to swim!"\n—Makht, goblin casualty

name: Fog
text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor: "More armies have been lost in the confusion of the jungle mists than to any battle."\n—Jolrael

name: Foratog
text: {G}, Sacrifice a Forest: Foratog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: Five hundred years to grow—barely a minute to eat.

name: Forbidden Crypt
text: If you would draw a card, return a card from your graveyard to your hand instead. If you can't, you lose the game.\nIf a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere, exile that card instead.

name: Forsaken Wastes
text: Players can't gain life.\nAt the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player loses 1 life.\nWhenever Forsaken Wastes becomes the target of a spell, that spell's controller loses 5 life.

name: Frenetic Efreet
text: Flying\n{0}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, Frenetic Efreet phases out. If you lose the flip, sacrifice Frenetic Efreet. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before you untap during your next untap step.)

name: Giant Mantis
text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: "I hate insects of every sort. The only mercy is that they are generally small."\n—Mwani, Mtenda goatherd

name: Gibbering Hyenas
text: Gibbering Hyenas can't block black creatures.
flavor: Hyenas laughing—what's the joke?\n—Femeref phrase meaning\n"that's not funny"

name: Goblin Elite Infantry
text: Whenever Goblin Elite Infantry blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: They talk a good fight.

name: Goblin Scouts
text: Put three 1/1 red Goblin Scout creature tokens with mountainwalk onto the battlefield. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

flavor: Better to fight the sand for a few hours than to sleep beneath it forever.\n—Suq'Ata truism

name: Sapphire Charm
text:
Choose one —
• Target player draws a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
• Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
• Target creature an opponent controls phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before its controller untaps during his or her next untap step.)

name: Savage Twister
text: Savage Twister deals X damage to each creature.
flavor: "Frozen, we watched the funnel pluck up three of the goats—pook! pook! pook!—before we ran for the wadi."\n—Travelogue of Najat

name: Sawback Manticore
text: {4}: Sawback Manticore gains flying until end of turn.\n{1}: Sawback Manticore deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. Activate this ability only if Sawback Manticore is attacking or blocking and only once each turn.

name: Sea Scryer
text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{1}, {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

name: Sealed Fate
text: Look at the top X cards of target opponent's library. Exile one of those cards and put the rest back on top of that player's library in any order.
flavor: It's good to know more about your enemy's fate than your enemy does.

name: Searing Spear Askari
text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)\n{1}{R}: Searing Spear Askari gains menace until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor: When the other soldiers of Zhalfir fall, the askaris will yet stand.

name: Seedling Charm
text:
Choose one —
• Return target Aura attached to a creature to its owner's hand.
• Regenerate target green creature.
• Target creature gains trample until end of turn.

name: Seeds of Innocence
text: Destroy all artifacts. They can't be regenerated. The controller of each of those artifacts gains life equal to its converted mana cost.
flavor: "I have hidden from the machinations of Zhalfir for centuries. Why should I join your campaign?"\n—Jolrael

name: Serene Heart
text: Destroy all Auras.
flavor: "If magic is your crutch, cast it aside and learn to walk without it."\n—Teferi

name: Sewer Rats
text: {B}, Pay 1 life: Sewer Rats gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than three times each turn.
flavor: You lie down with rats, and the rats run away.\n—Suq'Ata insult

name: Shadow Guildmage
text: {U}, {T}: Put target creature you control on top of its owner's library.\n{R}, {T}: Shadow Guildmage deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to you.
flavor: To keep the dead so others may live.\n—Shadow Guild maxim

name: Shadowbane
text: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you and/or creatures you control this turn, prevent that damage. If damage from a black source is prevented this way, you gain that much life.
flavor: Light creates shadow; light destroys shadow. Such is the transience of darkness.

name: Shallow Grave
text: Return the top creature card of your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste until end of turn. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: Good help is hard to dig up.

name: Shaper Guildmage
text: {W}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.\n{B}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Shape this world in Zhalfir's image.\n—Shaper Guild maxim

name: Shauku, Endbringer
text:
Flying
Shauku, Endbringer can't attack if there's another creature on the battlefield.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 3 life.
{T}: Exile target creature and put a +1/+1 counter on Shauku.

name: Shauku's Minion
text: {B}{R}, {T}: Shauku's Minion deals 2 damage to target white creature.
flavor: "My minions serve me in the light; I serve no one."\n—Shauku, Endbringer

name: Shimmer
text: As Shimmer enters the battlefield, choose a land type.\nEach land of the chosen type has phasing. (It phases in or out before its controller untaps during each of his or her untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)
flavor: To buy unseen land, pay in unseen coin.\n—Suq'Ata maxim

name: Sidar Jabari
text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)\nWhenever Sidar Jabari attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.
flavor: "Prophecy is whatever one makes of it, but destiny cannot be changed."\n—Sidar Jabari

name: Sirocco
text: Target player reveals his or her hand. For each blue instant card revealed this way, that player discards that card unless he or she pays 4 life.
flavor: "Blow, fiery wind, / strip illusion from the eye. / Blow, fiery wind of truth."\n—Femeref chant

name: Skulking Ghost
text: Flying\nWhen Skulking Ghost becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
flavor: "They exist only so long as the living take no notice."\n—Kifimbo, Shadow Guildmage

name: Sky Diamond
text: Sky Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

name: Soar
text: You may cast Soar as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step.\nEnchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +0/+1 and has flying.
flavor: "Would you give up your hands to fly? That is what the birds have done."\n—The One Thousand Questions

name: Soul Echo
text: Soul Echo enters the battlefield with X echo counters on it.\nYou don't lose the game for having 0 or less life.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Soul Echo if there are no echo counters on it. Otherwise, target opponent may choose that for each 1 damage that would be dealt to you until your next upkeep, you remove an echo counter from Soul Echo instead.

name: Soul Rend
text: Destroy target creature if it's white. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated.\nDraw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor: "Since I cannot stop death, I choose to stop life."\n—Kaervek

name: Soulshriek
text: Target creature you control gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: "The flesh is a casket for the soul."\n—Shauku, Endbringer

name: Spatial Binding
text: Pay 1 life: Until your next upkeep, target permanent can't phase out.
flavor: Time is the one shackle you can't break.\n—Zhalfirin aphorism

name: Spectral Guardian
text: As long as Spectral Guardian is untapped, noncreature artifacts have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
flavor: "A treasure to guard other treasures is worth the highest price."\n—Mtai, Civic Guildmage

name: Spirit of the Night
text: Flying, trample, haste, protection from black\nSpirit of the Night has first strike as long as it's attacking.

name: Spitting Earth
text: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.
flavor: "There are times solid ground gives precious little comfort."\n—Talibah, embermage

name: Stalking Tiger
text: Stalking Tiger can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor: In the Jamuraan jungles, there is often no separating beauty from danger.

name: Stone Rain
text: Destroy target land.
flavor: "What rainbow could possibly come of this rain?"\n—Asmira, Holy Avenger

name: Stupor
text: Target opponent discards a card at random, then discards a card.
flavor: There are medicines for all afflictions but idleness.\n—Suq'Ata saying

name: Subterranean Spirit
text: Protection from red\n{T}: Subterranean Spirit deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
flavor: "Air hot with sulfur. / Earth heaves beneath me. / Could it be the mountain / ate something bad?"\n—Dwarven mining song

name: Sunweb
text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)\nFlying\nSunweb can't block creatures with power 2 or less.
flavor: "There is no sweeter music than the wails of a dying dragon."\n—Rashida Scalebane

name: Superior Numbers
text: Superior Numbers deals damage to target creature equal to the number of creatures you control in excess of the number of creatures target opponent controls.

name: Suq'Ata Firewalker
text: Suq'Ata Firewalker can't be the target of red spells or abilities from red sources.\n{T}: Suq'Ata Firewalker deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: "Comfortable even in a furnace? I've never met one who'd accept my wager."\n—Talibah, embermage

name: Tainted Specter
text: Flying\n{1}{B}{B}, {T}: Target player discards a card unless he or she puts a card from his or her hand on top of his or her library. If that player discards a card this way, Tainted Specter deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: Talruum Minotaur
text: Haste
flavor: Don't insult a Talruum unless your mount is swift.\n—Suq'Ata saying

name: Taniwha
text: Trample\nPhasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, all lands you control phase out. (They phase in before you untap during your next untap step.)
flavor: "Taniwha rolls in its sleep, and the land is awash with the waves."\n—Poetics of Hanan

name: Teeka's Dragon
text: Flying; trample; rampage 4 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +4/+4 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)

name: Teferi's Curse
text: Enchant artifact or creature\nEnchanted permanent has phasing. (It phases in or out before its controller untaps during each of his or her untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)
flavor: "Stepping through time is like riding a camel. It may get you where you want to go, but the ride is rarely pleasant."\n—Teferi

name: Teferi's Drake
text: Flying\nPhasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)
flavor: "We threw dried fruit to the drakes that rode the air, streaming along the Weatherlight's side as we sailed amidst the clouds."\n—Sisay, Captain of the Weatherlight

name: Teferi's Imp
text:
Flying
Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)
Whenever Teferi's Imp phases out, discard a card.
Whenever Teferi's Imp phases in, draw a card.
flavor: Made you look.

name: Teferi's Isle
text: Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)\nTeferi's Isle enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {U}{U} to your mana pool.
flavor: The three wizards knew only that this isle held a great mystery—and that patience alone would solve it.

name: Telim'Tor
text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)\nWhenever Telim'Tor attacks, all attacking creatures with flanking get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "The curious merely amass knowledge. The ambitious use it."\n—Telim'Tor

name: Telim'Tor's Darts
text: {2}, {T}: Telim'Tor's Darts deals 1 damage to target player.
flavor: "People laughed at my darts—once."\n—Telim'Tor

name: Telim'Tor's Edict
text: Exile target permanent you own or control.\nDraw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor: "Execution awaits the dissenter."\n—Kasib ibn Naji, Letters

name: Teremko Griffin
text: Flying; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor: "When we're aloft, I love to lean over the Weatherlight's railing and watch the patterns the griffins' shadows make on the clouds below."\n—Sisay, Captain of the Weatherlight

name: Thirst
text:
Enchant creature
When Thirst enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Thirst unless you pay {U}.
flavor: The first of the Thousand Deaths.

name: Tidal Wave
text: Put a 5/5 blue Wall creature token with defender onto the battlefield. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: When mountains ride the sea, waves live upon the fields.

name: Tombstone Stairwell
text: Cumulative upkeep {1}{B} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)\nAt the beginning of each upkeep, if Tombstone Stairwell is on the battlefield, each player puts a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with haste named Tombspawn onto the battlefield for each creature card in his or her graveyard.\nAt the beginning of each end step or when Tombstone Stairwell leaves the battlefield, destroy all tokens put onto the battlefield with Tombstone Stairwell. They can't be regenerated.

name: Torrent of Lava
text: Torrent of Lava deals X damage to each creature without flying.\nAs long as Torrent of Lava is on the stack, each creature has "{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to this creature by Torrent of Lava this turn."
flavor: The mountain's voice shouts us all down.

name: Tranquil Domain
text: Destroy all non-Aura enchantments.
flavor: "An ancient court mage unified the houses into guilds to serve Zhalfir above their own interests. Even during the civil war, the guilds stood together, a testament to the wisdom of Teferi."\n—Afari, Tales

name: Tropical Storm
text: Tropical Storm deals X damage to each creature with flying and 1 additional damage to each blue creature.
flavor: "After the storm, I found a sea turtle dying on the sands, a blade of grass driven through its shell."\n—Travelogue of Najat

name: Uktabi Faerie
text: Flying\n{3}{G}, Sacrifice Uktabi Faerie: Destroy target artifact.
flavor: Victim of the two-toed faerie\n—Suq'Ata expression meaning "broken"

name: Uktabi Wildcats
text: Uktabi Wildcats's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control.\n{G}, Sacrifice a Forest: Regenerate Uktabi Wildcats.

name: Unerring Sling
text: {3}, {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Unerring Sling deals damage equal to the tapped creature's power to target attacking or blocking creature with flying.

name: Unfulfilled Desires
text: {1}, Pay 1 life: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor: "Like Day from Night, / I'll live my life apart from you, just glimpsing you across the sky, / because you cannot change, my dear, and nor can I."\n—"Love Song of Night and Day"

name: Unseen Walker
text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)\n{1}{G}{G}: Target creature gains forestwalk until end of turn.
flavor: "To pass through the jungle: silence, courtesy, ferocity, as the occasion demands."\n—Kamau, "Proper Passage"

name: Unyaro Bee Sting
text: Unyaro Bee Sting deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: "Much can be learned from the bees about dying for a cause."\n—Asmira, Holy Avenger

name: Unyaro Griffin
text: Flying\nSacrifice Unyaro Griffin: Counter target red instant or sorcery spell.
flavor: The griffin's shadow gives courage to the righteous and dread to the idle.

name: Urborg Panther
text: {B}, Sacrifice Urborg Panther: Destroy target creature blocking Urborg Panther.\nSacrifice a creature named Feral Shadow, a creature named Breathstealer, and Urborg Panther: Search your library for a card named Spirit of the Night and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Vaporous Djinn
text: Flying\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, Vaporous Djinn phases out unless you pay {U}{U}. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before you untap during your next untap step.)
flavor: "What is taking them so long to fill the waterskins?"\n—Mwani, Mtenda goatherd

name: Ventifact Bottle
text: {X}{1}, {T}: Put X charge counters on Ventifact Bottle. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.\nAt the beginning of your precombat main phase, if Ventifact Bottle has a charge counter on it, tap it and remove all charge counters from it. Add {C} to your mana pool for each charge counter removed this way.

name: Viashino Warrior
flavor: "When traveling the Great Desert avoid wearing the scales of lizards, for the Viashino rule the sands and look poorly on the skinning of their cousins."\n—Zhalfirin Guide to the Desert

name: Vigilant Martyr
text: Sacrifice Vigilant Martyr: Regenerate target creature.\n{W}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Vigilant Martyr: Counter target spell that targets an enchantment.

name: Village Elder
text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Regenerate target creature.
flavor: "Enchant me with your tale-telling. Tell about Tree, Grass, River, and Wind. / Tell why Truth must fight with Falsehood, and why Truth will always win."\n—"Love Song of Night and Day"

name: Vitalizing Cascade
text: You gain X plus 3 life.
flavor: "Water is like breathing—necessary for life."\n—Asmira, Holy Avenger

name: Volcanic Dragon
text: Flying\nHaste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor: Speed and fire are always a deadly combination.

name: Volcanic Geyser
text: Volcanic Geyser deals X damage to target creature or player.
flavor: My thunder comes before the lightning; my lightning comes before the clouds; my rain dries all the land it touches. What am I?\n—Femeref riddle

name: Waiting in the Weeds
text: Each player puts a 1/1 green Cat creature token onto the battlefield for each untapped Forest he or she controls.
flavor: The trees have ears, eyes, and teeth.

name: Wall of Corpses
text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)\n{B}, Sacrifice Wall of Corpses: Destroy target creature Wall of Corpses is blocking.
flavor: "I shall make walls of their flesh, and their blood will be my mortar."\n—Kaervek

name: Wall of Resistance
text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)\nFlying\nAt the beginning of each end step, if Wall of Resistance was dealt damage this turn, put a +0/+1 counter on it.
flavor: Telim'Tor could no longer recall the exact number of assaults—but his troops could.

name: Wall of Roots
text: Defender\nPut a -0/-1 counter on Wall of Roots: Add {G} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavor: Sometimes the wise ones wove their magic into living plants; as the plant grew, so grew the magic.

flavor: Even wurms start out small.

name: Wave Elemental
text: {U}, {T}, Sacrifice Wave Elemental: Tap up to three target creatures without flying.
flavor: "Consider the wave: how weak the mother yet how strong the child."\n—Tywanna, Shaper Guildmage

name: Wellspring
text: Enchant land\nWhen Wellspring enters the battlefield, gain control of enchanted land until end of turn.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, untap enchanted land. You gain control of that land until end of turn.

name: Wild Elephant
text: Trample
flavor: "I will tell my father's stories . . . . How the elephants trampled the leopard cub, and its father, though he knew, killed nine goats instead."\n—"Love Song of Night and Day"

name: Wildfire Emissary
text: Protection from white\n{1}{R}: Wildfire Emissary gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "The efreet is a striding storm with a voice that crackles like fire."\n—Qhattib, Vizier of Amiqat

name: Windreaper Falcon
text: Flying, protection from blue
flavor: Watching the windreaper\n—Zhalfirin phrase meaning\n"daydreaming"

name: Withering Boon
text: As an additional cost to cast Withering Boon, pay 3 life.\nCounter target creature spell.
flavor: "Life for life: this is the immutable law."\n—Panya, Granger Guildmage

name: Worldly Tutor
text: Search your library for a creature card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.
flavor: "Aselbo soon had the rhino eating from his palm and the snake waiting at his heels."\n—Afari, Tales

name: Yare
text: Target creature defending player controls gets +3/+0 until end of turn. That creature can block up to two additional creatures this turn.

name: Zebra Unicorn
text: Whenever Zebra Unicorn deals damage, you gain that much life.
flavor: "I'll capture gentle zebras / for your steeds and fill the stable with every kind of unicorn."\n—"Love Song of Night and Day"

name: Zhalfirin Commander
text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)\n{1}{W}{W}: Target Knight creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "Command is the act of balancing on a vine and convincing others that it is firm ground."\n—Sidar Jabari

name: Zhalfirin Knight
text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)\n{W}{W}: Zhalfirin Knight gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor: "You returned a warrior. . . . Your hair was cut, your eye tattooed with the red triangle of war."\n—"Love Song of Night and Day"

name: Zirilan of the Claw
text: {1}{R}{R}, {T}: Search your library for a Dragon permanent card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. That Dragon gains haste until end of turn. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

text: Flying\nOther Griffin creatures get +1/+1.
